full_summary:
###  Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal RFP
#### Title and Description
**English:** EF245-231427-2, RFP, Acquisition, Delivery, and Installation of Category 1, 2, and 5 Office Furniture (SA E60PQ-140003-2) for Department of National Defence (DND)

**French:** EF245-231427, DDP, Acquisition, livraison, installation de mobiliers cat. 1, 2 et 5 sous l'AMA E60PQ-140003 pour le ministère de la Défense nationale

#### Reference Information
* Solicitation number: WS3754817841
* Reference number: WS3754817841-Doc3813992363

#### Tender Details
* Publication date: January 04, 2023
* Closing date: January 04, 2023, 14:00 PM EST (Eastern Standard Time)
* Expected contract start date: Not specified
* Expected contract end date: August 01, 2023

#### Procurement Information
* Notice type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements
* The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
* None

#### Regions of Delivery
* Montréal, Québec, Canada

#### Contact Information
* Contact person: Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact email: lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact title: (None)
